entry.title: Congratulations to Priya Prakash for the ADDF Young Investigators Scholarship

link.title: Congratulations to Priya Prakash for the ADDF Young Investigators Scholarship

entry.content: This award is given by the Alzheimer’s Drug Discovery Foundation to attend the 19th International Conference on Alzheimer’s Drug Discovery.
entry.summary: This award is given by the Alzheimer’s Drug Discovery Foundation to attend the 19th International Conference on Alzheimer’s Drug Discovery.

entry.title: Preprint - “Lemon - a modern C++ tool for the rapid development of structural benchmarking datasets”

link.title: Preprint - "Lemon - a modern C++ tool for the rapid development of structural benchmarking datasets"

entry.content:
The Lemon software is available as a C++ header library along with example functions at https://github.com/chopralab/lemon.

Paper
entry.summary: The Lemon software is available as a C++ header library along with example functions at https://github.com/chopralab/lemon.

entry.title: Our Lab presents poster at CSHL Glia meeting on pH dependent Abeta Chemical Tools

link.title: Our Lab presents poster at CSHL Glia meeting on pH dependent Abeta Chemical Tools

entry.content:
Priya Prakash presented our work on developing chemical tools to study microglial exhaustion and phagocytic specificity.

CSHL Glia
entry.summary: Priya Prakash presented our work on developing chemical tools to study microglial exhaustion and phagocytic specificity.

entry.title: Publication - “An analysis and evaluation of the WeFold collaborative for protein structure prediction and its pipelines in CASP11 and CASP12”

link.title: Publication - "An analysis and evaluation of the WeFold collaborative for protein structure prediction and its pipelines in CASP11 and CASP12"

entry.content:
This paper analyzes the results of the 2014 and 2016 protein prediction pipelines showing improvements according to the CASP assessment as well as areas that require further adjustments and research.

Paper
entry.summary: This paper analyzes the results of the 2014 and 2016 protein prediction pipelines showing improvements according to the CASP assessment as well as areas that require further adjustments and research.

entry.title: Gaurav gives talk at Roswell Park Cancer Center

link.title: Gaurav gives talk at Roswell Park Cancer Center

entry.content: The title of the talk was “Machine learning based Computational Modeling to Guide Chemical Synthetic selections for Cancer Specific Lethality and immunotherapy.”
entry.summary: The title of the talk was “Machine learning based Computational Modeling to Guide Chemical Synthetic selections for Cancer Specific Lethality and immunotherapy.”
